list.expr: group by (container, alertname) (ALERTS{namespace="vspspdm-$environment", container=~".+", tier="", alertstate="firing"})
list.name: Alerts

panels.description: The total number of actions generated by triggers
panels.title: Triggers

panels.description: The total number of actions generated by triggers
panels.title: Actions

panels.description: The total number of produced calculation tasks
panels.title: Price Calculation Tasks

panels.description: The total number of scheduled workflows
panels.title: Workflows - Scheduled

panels.description: The total number of finished workflows
panels.title: Workflows - Finished

panels.description: The total number of cancelled workflows
panels.title: Workflows - Cancelled

panels.description: Number of trigger messages received by collectors
panels.title: Trigger Messages by Container [$period]

panels.description: Distribution of triggers by their type
panels.title: Triggers by Type

panels.description: Number of generated pricing actions by type
panels.title: Triggers [$period]

targets.expr: {namespace="vspspdm-${environment}", container=~".*trigger-collector", pod=~".*"} | json | level=~"ERROR|WARN"| line_format "| {{.message | replace \"\\n\" \" \" }}"

panels.description: Number of processed pricing actions by type
panels.title: Actions [$period]

panels.description: Number of workflows that changed status
panels.title: Workflows [$period]

targets.expr: {namespace="vspspdm-${environment}", container=~".*workflow.*", pod=~".*"} | json | level=~"ERROR|WARN"| line_format "| {{.message | replace \"\\n\" \" \" }}"

panels.description: Number of produced calucaltion tasks by price reason
panels.title: Sales Price Calculation Tasks [$period]
